name: Foxy-t
description:
Hello !

Kindly check out my casual game #Foxy-t. 

It's a very easy to play arcade game for Android. The aim of the game is to jump from one moving platform to another, as they are randomly created, and collect balloons and diamonds. However, you should NOT fall into the water or hit the ceiling - that will cost you lives! Levels go on forever so there is no real end to the game. You can share your high scores on social media as well. I will gladly accept suggestions on how to improve this game. 

Get it on Google play (video and screenshots included) https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ja.test
